message.content:
Hi,

I would like to inform you that I will be resigning from my position at the company. My last day of work will be on [date]. I have enjoyed working with the team and appreciate all the opportunities I have had during my tenure here, but I am looking for a new challenge and feel it is time for me to move on to a different role. 


I would like to thank you for the opportunity to work with your company over the past [timeframe]. It has been an invaluable experience and I will always cherish my time here. I am excited about what the future holds and wish you and the company all the best. 


Thank you,
[Your Name]
